main_definition: A disagreement or argument, usually between two or more parties.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An exchange of differing views or opinions.
meanings_and_examples.example: The neighbors had a dispute over the property boundary.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A formal disagreement that may require legal intervention.
meanings_and_examples.example: They decided to take their business dispute to court.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To deny or challenge something, typically in a confrontational manner.
meanings_and_examples.example: He disputed the accuracy of the statistics presented by his opponent.
